text:
Hello,

I am currently enrolling users in my workflow, and if they meet all criteria, a property "Trigger NPS" will be set as "YES" and a survey will be sent to them.

The feedback is stored in a property inside the feedback submission object.

I want to set a workflow that alerts me when a user receives my survey email, and doesn't give feedback after 2 days from receiving it.

I tried creating alot of workflows, Feedback submission and contact workflows, to check if the feedback submission property field in unknown and trigger NPS is set to YES, but for some reason it is not working.

Anybody tried creating a similar flow ?
